Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 32 Improvement Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 16; Skill: 2
Features/Skills
Edges (9 points): Expert (Athletics); Followers; Master (Athletics); Master Of Arms; Professional (Athletics); Sidekick; Tough As Nails; Tougher Than Nails; Weapon Master Hindrances: Cautious; Mean; Ugly+ Avion Features: Can't Swim; Flight; Frail; Keen Senses; Reduced Pace
Feature Notes:
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Followers: Gain 5 Soldier followers
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Sidekick: Special bond with companion
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d12+2 Fighting: (agi) d12 Persuasion: (spi) d4-3
Battle: (sma) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d8
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d8

Keen Senses: +1 Notice die
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Professional (Athletics): +2 Athletics
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Flight: Use Athletics for flight maneuvers
Master (Athletics): Use d10 for Wild Die
Combat
